name: Melffy Catty
text: If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s), or this card is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: You can return this card to the hand, then you can add 1 Beast monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Melffy Catty". During your End Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Melffy Catty" once per turn.
